history.proof: intros n m p H1 H2. strivial use: Z.mul_lt_mono_neg_l.

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
apply Zmult_lt_compat_l_rev with (p := p) in H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m p : Z, 0 < p -> n * p < m * p -> n < m" on hypothesis of type "n < m".

original: intros n m p H1 H2. apply Zmult_lt_compat_l_rev with (p := p) in H2. apply Zmult_lt_reg_r in H2. auto. auto.
